name: oci_new_descriptor
purpose: Initializes a new empty LOB or FILE descriptor

return.description: Returns a new LOB or FILE descriptor on success, FALSE on error.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocinewdescriptor instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_new_descriptor for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
